Question: Tonomia SRL. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Tonomia SRL

eParking Solar Solution at CES 2024

- Modular photovoltaic infrastructure generates and stores electricity, supports adjacent buildings
- Robust storage system (40 kWh/parking space) for self-consumption and grid stabilization
- AI-driven quality assurance and reliability
- Environmentally-friendly materials, Sodium-Ion batteries, rainwater recovery
- Patent-protected with 25 subsystems, 16 exclusive
- Smart box with dual microprocessors, Wi-Fi, and 4G/5G connectivity
- Thermal imaging, bird repelling, fire detection, and self-cleaning system
- Supports daily energy consumption of multiple homes, fast charging system
- Ultra-modular, scalable for 2-4 parking spaces, pre-assembled modules
- Visionary approach merging technical prowess with environmental responsibility
- eParking solar module for big parking lots, ion sodium batteries, EV charging systems, and IoT for advanced monitoring and change management showcased at CES 2024.
